channel.subscribe.name: Subscribe
channel.subscribe.description: A specified channel receives a subscriber. This does not include resubscribes.

channel.subscription.gift.name: Gift Subscription
channel.subscription.gift.description: A viewer gives a gift subscription to one or more users in the channel.

channel.subscription.message.name: Message Subscription
channel.subscription.message.description: A user sends a resubscription chat message in a specific channel.

channel.cheer.name: Cheer
channel.cheer.description: A user cheers on the specified channel.

channel.raid.name: Raid
channel.raid.description: A broadcaster raids another broadcasterâ€™s channel.

channel.hype_train.begin.name: Hype Train Begins
channel.hype_train.begin.description: A Hype Train begins on the specified channel.

channel.hype_train.progress.name: Hype Train Progress
channel.hype_train.progress.description: A Hype Train makes progress on the specified channel.

channel.hype_train.end.name: Hype Train Ends
channel.hype_train.end.description: A Hype Train ends on the specified channel.

channel.channel_points_custom_reward_red.name: Redeem Channel Points
channel.channel_points_custom_reward_red.description: A viewer has redeemed a custom channel points reward on the specified channel.
